briefTitle: Low Dose Tomosynthesis Compared to Traditional Tomosynthesis
officialTitle: Low Dose Tomosynthesis Compared to Traditional Tomosynthesis
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Woman over 40 years of age
* Has a tomosynthesis examination with comparator
* Has a mammographic finding

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pregnant, breastfeeding or believes she may be pregnant
* Unable or unwilling to give informed consent
